mapper.insert: insert into WMS_ERROR_MSG (IF_NAME, IF_KEY, IF_MESSAGE, adddate, FLAG) values (#{ifName,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{ifKey,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{ifMessage,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{adddate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

insert into WMS_ERROR_MSG
IF_NAME,
IF_KEY,
IF_MESSAGE,
adddate,
FLAG,
#{ifName,jdbcType=OTHER},
#{ifKey,jdbcType=OTHER},
#{ifMessage,jdbcType=OTHER},
#{adddate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{flag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
mapper.update: update wmslog.process_message set flag = 1 where if_key = #{ifKey}

update wmslog.process_message set flag = 1 where if_key in (select distinct IF_KEY from wmslog.process_message where if_type = 'E' AND IF_adddate >= TO_dATE('2018-12-18', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND IF_KEY IS NOT NULL AND IF_MESSAGE IS NOT NULL and flag = 1) and flag = 0 and if_type = 'E' AND IF_adddate >= TO_dATE('2018-12-18', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND IF_KEY IS NOT NULL AND IF_MESSAGE IS NOT NULL
mapper.select: select distinct IF_NAME ifName,IF_KEY ifKey, IF_MESSAGE ifMessage,FLAG flag from WMS_ERROR_MSG where flag = 0
